metadata.description: Master list of official Indian government recruitment notification sites for ExamTracker scraper — URL-verified February 2026. Includes all RRBs, State PSCs, State SSBs, State Police boards, High Courts, PSUs, and Central bodies.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: Staff Selection Commission
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: CORRECTED: Migrated from ssc.nic.in to ssc.gov.in. CGL, CHSL, MTS, CPO, JE, Steno all come from here. Check Portal/Notices for new notifications.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: Union Public Service Commission
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: IAS, IPS, IFS, CDS, NDA, CAPF all originate here. Use /examinations/active-exams for active notifications.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: Institute of Banking Personnel Selection
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: IBPS PO, Clerk, SO, RRB — all bank recruitment except SBI and RBI. Notifications appear on homepage.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: State Bank of India
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: SBI PO, Clerk, SO, Specialist Officer. Separate portal from IBPS.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: Reserve Bank of India
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: RBI Grade B, Assistant, Legal Officer, Research. RSS available — use it.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: Employment News (Government of India)
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: Aggregates ALL central government job notifications. Gold mine. Use RSS first.

CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.name: National Career Service - Govt Job Vacancies
CENTRAL_EXAM_BODIES.notes: Ministry of Labour & Employment portal. Links to ALL ministry recruitment pages. Use as discovery, not primary source.

RAILWAY_RRB.name: RRB Secunderabad
RAILWAY_RRB.notes: CORRECTED: Migrated from rrbsecunderabad.nic.in to rrbsecunderabad.gov.in

RAILWAY_RRB.name: Indian Railways - Railway Recruitment Cells (RRC)
RAILWAY_RRB.notes: RRC handles Level 1 Group D posts. Separate from RRB.

STATE_PSC.name: Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission
STATE_PSC.notes: Largest state PSC by applicant volume. PCS, RO/ARO, Lecturer.

STATE_PSC.name: Goa Public Service Commission
STATE_PSC.notes: Small state, low volume but still valid.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Join Indian Army
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: Agniveer, TES, SSC Tech, NCC Entry, JAG — all army recruitment.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Join Indian Navy
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: SSR, AA, Agniveer Navy, Officer entries.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Indian Air Force - AFCAT
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: AFCAT twice yearly. Flying and Ground Duty branches.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Indian Coast Guard Recruitment
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: Navik GD, Yantrik, Officer entries. CGEPT twice yearly.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Central Reserve Police Force
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: CORRECTED: Use rect.crpf.gov.in (recruitment portal) not crpf.gov.in/recruitment.htm

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Border Security Force
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: CORRECTED: Use rectt.bsf.gov.in (recruitment portal) not bsf.gov.in/recruitment.html

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Defence Research and Development Organisation
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: CEPTAM, Scientist B, JRF, Technical Assistant. High interest from engineering graduates.

DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.name: Armed Forces Medical Services
DEFENCE_AND_PARAMILITARY.notes: Military Nursing Service (MNS), Army Medical Corps (AMC), Short Service Commission (Medical), Dental Officer. Separate from general Army recruitment — targets nursing and medical graduates.

BANKING_ADDITIONAL.name: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
BANKING_ADDITIONAL.notes: Grade A, B development assistant. Popular with finance/agriculture graduates. CORRECTED notification page path.

BANKING_ADDITIONAL.name: Securities and Exchange Board of India
BANKING_ADDITIONAL.notes: Grade A Officer. Highly competitive, popular with MBA/Law graduates.

BANKING_ADDITIONAL.name: Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority
BANKING_ADDITIONAL.notes: Assistant Manager. Less frequent but premium exam.

BANKING_ADDITIONAL.name: Life Insurance Corporation of India
BANKING_ADDITIONAL.notes: LIC AAO, ADO, HFL. Huge aspirant interest. CORRECTED careers URL.

BANKING_ADDITIONAL.name: India Post Payments Bank
BANKING_ADDITIONAL.notes: India Post Payments Bank — banking + postal hybrid. Junior Associate, Assistant Manager. Growing entity with increasing vacancies.

TEACHING.name: CTET - NTA
TEACHING.notes: Central Teacher Eligibility Test. Twice yearly, 30 lakh+ applicants.

TEACHING.name: Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan
TEACHING.notes: PRT, TGT, PGT teachers. Central govt teacher jobs with national postings.

TEACHING.name: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board
TEACHING.notes: Delhi teachers, TGT, PGT. Also non-teaching posts.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: Indian Space Research Organisation
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Scientist/Engineer SC. Dream job for engineering aspirants. Very high aspirant interest.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: Food Corporation of India
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: AG, JE, typist, watchmen. Massive scale — lakhs apply.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: RITES Limited
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Railway infrastructure consultancy PSU under Ministry of Railways. Graduate Engineer Trainee, Managers, Consultants.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: Container Corporation of India (CONCOR)
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Logistics/container PSU under Ministry of Railways. Management Trainee, Executive positions.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: National Hydroelectric Power Corporation
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Power sector Navratna PSU. Trainee Engineer, Supervisor Trainee. Mostly engineering disciplines.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: REC Limited (Rural Electrification Corporation)
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Power finance NBFC under Ministry of Power. Management Trainee, Officer roles. Finance/Engineering background preferred.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: Government telecom PSU. JTO (Junior Telecom Officer), TTA (Telecom Technical Assistant), External Exam via GATE. Vacancies less frequent but large when released.

PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.name: GATE - IIT Official Portal (PSU Recruitment via GATE)
PSU_MAHARATNA_NAVRATNA.notes: GATE score used by 50+ PSUs for direct recruitment: ONGC, NTPC, BHEL, HPCL, IOCL, PGCIL, BPCL, GAIL, NLC, HAL, BEL, MECL, NMDC, NPCIL, SAIL, NALCO, NFL, RINL and more. GATE organising institute changes yearly — current 2026 host is IIT Kharagpur. Update URL annually. Tracking GATE PSU notifications covers dozens of organisations in one place.

HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.name: AIIMS - Common Recruitment Exam (CRE)
HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.notes: Centralized Group B & C recruitment for all AIIMS campuses. 1000+ vacancies per cycle.

HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.name: Employees State Insurance Corporation
HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.notes: SSO, UDC, MTS, Stenographer, Medical posts.

HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.name: National Health Mission (Central)
HEALTH_AND_MEDICAL.notes: ANM, CHO, Staff Nurse at state NHM level. Monitor individual state NHMs too.

TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.name: India Post - Gramin Dak Sevak (GDS) Recruitment
TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.notes: 28,000+ GDS vacancies per cycle. 10th pass eligible. Selection purely on 10th marks — no exam. Covers all 23 postal circles. Massive rural aspirant segment. Official portal: indiapostgdsonline.gov.in. Also check indiapost.gov.in/vacancies for other India Post recruitment (non-GDS: Postmaster, MTS, etc.).

TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.name: India Post - Department of Posts (Non-GDS Recruitment)
TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.notes: Non-GDS posts: Postmaster Grade I/II/III, MTS, Stenographer, Staff Car Driver, Postal Assistant. Separate from GDS portal.

TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.name: Delhi Metro Rail Corporation
TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.notes: Junior Engineer, Maintainer, Customer Relations. High demand in NCR.

TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.name: IRCTC Careers
TRANSPORT_AND_INFRASTRUCTURE.notes: CORRECTED: Use irctc.com/recruitment.php (NOT irctc.co.in/nget/train-search which is train booking)

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: Supreme Court of India - Registry
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Court Officer, Court Master, Law Clerk. Rare but prestigious.

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: High Courts (State-level, multiple)
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Each High Court (Delhi, Allahabad, Bombay, Madras, Calcutta etc.) has its own site. Add individual entries per high court. Very underrated category.

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: Allahabad High Court
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Largest High Court by number of judges and staff. Review Officer, ARO, Stenographer, Group C/D. Thousands of vacancies per recruitment cycle. Very popular among UP aspirants.

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: Delhi High Court
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Delhi HC Junior Judicial Assistant, Senior Personal Assistant, Law Clerk, Multi-Tasking Staff. High competition, good pay scale.

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: Bombay High Court
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Bombay HC covers Maharashtra, Goa, Dadra & Nagar Haveli. Clerk, Steno, Peon, Technical posts.

JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.name: Madras High Court
JUDICIARY_AND_LAW.notes: Tamil Nadu and Puducherry jurisdiction. Junior Assistant, Typist, Night Watchman, System Analyst posts.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: NITI Aayog
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Deputation, consultants, specialists. Not well tracked by competitors.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Ministry of Home Affairs
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. IB, direct ministry posts. Not well covered by aggregators.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Ministry of External Affairs
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Foreign Service posts, passport officers.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Nuclear Power Corporation of India
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Scientific Assistant, Stipendiary Trainee. Dream for nuclear engineering aspirants.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Bhabha Atomic Research Centre
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Scientific Officer, Technical Officer. Very prestigious, low competition awareness.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Indian Council of Medical Research
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Research posts for science graduates.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Indian Council of Agricultural Research
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED. Scientist, Technical Officer for agriculture graduates.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research
Indian National Centre for Ocean Information Services
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: VERY UNDERRATED. Scientist, Technical post for oceanography/science grads. Zero coverage on competitors.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Forest Research Institute
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: VERY UNDERRATED. Technical and scientific posts for forestry graduates.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: VERY UNDERRATED. For AYUSH/Ayurveda degree holders. Zero competitor coverage.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Tamil Nadu Uniformed Services Recruitment Board
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: UNDERRATED on national platforms. TN Police SI, Constable. Massive TN state interest.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: Patwari, LDC, Lab Assistant. Huge Rajasthan-specific demand.

UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.name: Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MP Vyapam)
UNDERRATED_HIDDEN_GEMS.notes: Formerly MP Vyapam, now MPESB — esb.mp.gov.in. ALL state group B/C/D recruitment for MP: Police, Forest, Revenue, Teaching, Engineering. One of highest-volume state boards.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: Uttar Pradesh Subordinate Services Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D recruitment for UP state government. Conducts PET (Preliminary Eligibility Test) as gateway exam. Posts include Lekhpal, Patwari, Junior Assistant, Forest Guard, Lower PCS. DISTINCT from UPPSC which does Group A/B. Lakhs of vacancies per cycle.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: Bihar Staff Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D recruitment for Bihar. Posts: Inter-level (12th pass), Graduate-level, Stenographer. Massive Bihar aspirant base. DISTINCT from BPSC which does Group A/B.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: Jharkhand Staff Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D for Jharkhand. CGL, CHSL, JE, Panchayat Secretary, Constable. Official site: jssc.jharkhand.gov.in. Also accessible at jssc.nic.in.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: West Bengal Staff Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D for West Bengal. Clerkship, Group D, MTS, LDA. DISTINCT from WBPSC which does Group A/B.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: Odisha Staff Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D for Odisha. Junior Clerk, LI, Revenue Inspector etc. DISTINCT from OPSC.

STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.name: Uttarakhand Subordinate Service Selection Commission
STATE_STAFF_SELECTION_BOARDS.notes: Group C/D for Uttarakhand. Patwari, Lekhpal, VDO, Junior Assistant. URL is sssc.uk.gov.in.

STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.name: Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment & Promotion Board
STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.notes: Dedicated UP Police recruitment board. Constable, Sub-Inspector, Head Constable. Single largest state police recruitment — 60,000+ constable vacancies when notification drops. CRITICAL for UP aspirants.

STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.name: Rajasthan Police Recruitment
STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.notes: Rajasthan Police Constable, Sub-Inspector, Platoon Commander. Frequently releases large notifications.

STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.name: Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission
STATE_POLICE_RECRUITMENT.notes: Bihar Police Constable, Sub-Inspector, Sergeant, Excise Constable. Lakhs of applicants per notification.
